about_the_game:
Schizophrenia is a psychological survival horror.

You don't remember anything. You have to survive in the bunker in order to get out of it. Look for and use all the items that come your way.
The bunker can be dangerous. Who knows who might even be there.

FEATURES:


  • Growing horror
While in this bunker you begin to go crazy. You feel like someone is watching you. Strange sounds are constantly heard.
Something needs to be done to avoid going crazy. Find the pills. Or at least eat right.

  • Bunker
The bunker is equipped with a water supply system and electricity supply. But the lights begin to flicker. The hike will have to refuel the generator. The water stopped flowing. The water supply system may need to be repaired.

  • Nightmares and dreams
At night you can dream about a lot of different things. Sometimes these are strange and incomprehensible dreams that look like memories. Sometimes these are terrible nightmares that only make your condition worse. Try to control yourself and at such moments remember something with the help of dreams, find useful information for yourself that you have forgotten.



  • Bunker Dwellers
Could the inhabitants of the bunker be dangerous? What can you generally expect from them? It’s better for me to get around them or better find weapons for protection.
Remember. The main thing is not to go crazy. And further. Don't make loud noises. They can hear you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bits
  • Processor: Core i3 / AMD FX 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.0, Nvidia GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 5750 / Intel HD 630
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bits
  • Processor: Core i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.3, Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT / Intel Xe-HPG
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Schizophrenia is a game where you have to not go crazy and get out of the bunker. Use all the items you can find to survive. Remember. The main thing is not to go crazy. And further. Don't make loud noises. They can hear you.
